thread.title_full: Ground News - Iowa basketball star inspires artist to paint mural in her possible future home as WNBA Draft approaches

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Iowa basketball star inspires artist to paint mural in her possible future home as WNBA Draft approaches
text:
Summary by Ground News Iowa basketball star Caitlin Clark inspires artist to paint mural in her possible future home as WNBA Draft approaches. An artist has painted a mural of Clark in Indianapolis, home of the Indiana Fever. The mural was meant to inspire Indiana basketball fans, but one Hawkeye fan said he felt he had to see the art on his trip from Iowa City. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KETV Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Hearst Communications Iowa basketball star inspires artist to paint mural in her possible future home as WNBA Draft approaches As Iowa star Caitlin Clark gets ready to head to the pros, her possible future home is already making her feel welcome.
